pages.text: The $(item)Ritual Tinkerer$() is an essential tool for the advanced Blood Mage who is looking for all they can get out of their Rituals. It has three main modes, as described overleaf.

$(li)Information: Describes the function of the ritual, similar to the Ritual Diviner. $(li)Set Will Consumed: Tells the ritual which kinds of Demon Will (if any) to consume from the Aura. Specify this by carrying Demon Will Crystals in your hotbar, one for each type of will you wish the Ritual to consume. Further information about the effects of Demon Will upon Rituals can be found on each Ritual's respective page in this book.

$(li)Define Area: Specifies the zone that the ritual should work in, and displays the current zone. If multiple zones can be specified, shift-clicking will cycle through them. Some rituals can be expanded far beyond their default areas, but keep in mind that this will increase the LP cost to match...
